relevant_findings.examination: Alert but appeared chronically ill. Icteric sclerae and hepatomegaly noted.
relevant_findings.chest_radiography: Right hilar mass and pleural effusion observed.

changes_over_time.initial_condition: Stable with non-specific signs of illness.
changes_over_time.after_second_day_of_chemotherapy: Developed chest tightness, elevated creatine kinase, and non-ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction.
changes_over_time.spiking_fever: High spiking fever (40 °C) and loss of consciousness occurred 10 hours later, with profound shock noted.
